channel.title: Strength and conditioning on Under The Hood
channel.description: Recent content in Strength and conditioning on Under The Hood

item.title: How much do you get paid?
item.description: It’s a touchy subject for many. Yet this very question was posed by Aiden Oakley (@ajoakley on Twitter), and willingly answered by over 100 sport scientists and strength & conditioning coaches who currently work for football (soccer) clubs in the UK. Why? This job advert says it all… This is shocking! “Dear Candidate, please spend £27,000 on BSc, then £1000 on ASCC, to be paid less than half of this.
